FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='lab_est_cases_adjacentes',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          args=
            ParamList(
              params[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='case1',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    ArrayDecl(
                      dim_quals=[],
                      type=
                        TypeDecl(
                          declname='case1',
                          quals=[],
                          align=None,
                          type=
                            IdentifierType(
                              names=['int'],
                            )
                        )
                      dim=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='2',
                        )
                    )
                )
              params[1]=
                Decl(
                  name='case2',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    ArrayDecl(
                      dim_quals=[],
                      type=
                        TypeDecl(
                          declname='case2',
                          quals=[],
                          align=None,
                          type=
                            IdentifierType(
                              names=['int'],
                            )
                        )
                      dim=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='2',
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='lab_est_cases_adjacentes',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        Decl(
          name='distance',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='distance',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Assignment(
          op='=',
          lvalue=
            ID(
              name='distance',
            )
          rvalue=
            BinaryOp(
              op='+',
              left=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='abs',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='-',
                          left=
                            ArrayRef(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='case1',
                                )
                              subscript=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='0',
                                )
                            )
                          right=
                            ArrayRef(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='case2',
                                )
                              subscript=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='0',
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
              right=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='abs',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='-',
                          left=
                            ArrayRef(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='case1',
                                )
                              subscript=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='1',
                                )
                            )
                          right=
                            ArrayRef(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='case2',
                                )
                              subscript=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='1',
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        Return(
          expr=
            BinaryOp(
              op='==',
              left=
                ID(
                  name='distance',
                )
              right=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='1',
                )
            )
        )
    )
)
functions.question: Pouvez-vous expliquer pourquoi vous utilisez la fonction abs dans le calcul de votre distance et ce que cela signifie dans le contexte de cases adjacentes dans votre code ?

                                      left=

                                        )

                                        Constant(

                                          value='2',
                                        )
                                    )
                                  right=
                                    BinaryOp(
                                      op='==',
                                      left=
                                        ID(
                                          name='choix_selectionne',
                                        )
                                      right=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='int',
                                          value='3',
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                          right=
                            BinaryOp(
                              op='<=',
                              left=
                                ID(
                                  name='choix_selectionne',
                                )
                              right=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='0',
                                )
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='<',
                          left=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='4',
                            )
                          right=
                            ID(
                              name='choix_selectionne',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  iftrue=
                    Compound(
                      block_items[0]=
                        FuncCall(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='printf',
                            )
                          args=
                            ExprList(
                              exprs[0]=
                                Constant(
                                  type='string',
                                  value='"        Choix Invalide!\\n"',
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  iffalse=
                    Compound(
                      block_items[0]=
                        Break(
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[3]=
        Return(
          expr=
            ID(
              name='choix_selectionne',
            )
        )
    )
)

                  names=['void'],
                )

  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        FuncCall(
          name=

              name='system',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=

                  type='string',

              exprs[0]=

                  value='"                *************************\\n                *** LABYRINTHE EXPERT ***\\n                *************************\\n\\n"',
                )

        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"        %d. Charger un labyrinthe\\n"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='1',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[3]=
        If(
          cond=
            ID(
              name='grille_chargee',
            )
          iftrue=
            FuncCall(
              name=
                ID(

              args=
                ExprList(
                  exprs[0]=
                    Constant(
                      type='string',
                      value='"        %d. Resoudre le labyrinthe\\n"',

                  name='printf',
                )
              args=
                ExprList(
                  exprs[0]=
                    Constant(
                      type='string',
                      value='"        %d. [Indisponible] Resoudre le labyrinthe\\n"',
                    )
                  exprs[1]=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='2',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[4]=
        If(
          cond=
            ID(
              name='grille_chargee',
            )
          iftrue=
            FuncCall(
              name=
                ID(
                  name='printf',
                )
              args=
                ExprList(
                  exprs[0]=
                    Constant(
                      type='string',
                      value='"        %d. Resoudre le labyrinthe pas-a-pas\\n"',
                    )
                  exprs[1]=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='3',
                    )
                )
            )
          iffalse=
            FuncCall(
              name=
                ID(
                  name='printf',
                )
              args=
                ExprList(
                  exprs[0]=
                    Constant(
                      type='string',

                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='3',

                  value='4',
